channel.title: gutenbergtimes tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from gutenbergtimes.

item.description: Thank you for thinking of us! üòç https://t.co/4XouYy5JbZ

Building with Blocks, Hyping Headers, 52 Themes and more - Weekend Edition 204 - TY to @raemoreywrites @apeatling @gziolo @maryojob @ryanwelcher @CBringmann @rithuthakuri @pollyplummer @justintadlock @jffng @carolinapoena @critterverse 1/2 https://t.co/ggGyqZhTjG
TY to more contributors: @richard_tabor @ana_segota @pootlepress @RobCairns @matias_ventura @aurooba @wpbuilds 2/2

New: Gutenberg Changelog #61 - Gutenberg 12.6, Planning for WordPress 6.0 and Universal Blocks with co-hosts Grzegorz Ziolkowski @gziolo and Birgit Pauli-Haack @bph and new co-host Mary Job @maryojob - Huge thank you to @Gziolo for 21 episodes as co-host! https://t.co/StOb3gKRnW

Gutenberg Developer Hours, from Zero to Hero Series and much more! TY to @wpbuilds @extendify @josephahaden @karmatosed @mattmedeiros @pootlepress @carolinapoena @jameskoster @ryanwelcher @daisyolsen @jonihalabi @andyfragen @glendaviesnz @succoallapera [link]
Today, at WordPress Social Learning Spaces: "Zero to Block Theme Series #4: Templates & Template Parts" with Daisy Olsen@daisyolsen 1pm ET / 18:00 UTC [link]
WPTavern Jukebox episode with host Nathan Wrigley @wpbuilds with guests Chris Lubkert @chrislubkert and Rich Tabor @richard_tabor on Building Sites With @extendifyinc as guests [link]

New episode: Gutenberg Changelog #60 - Restricting Customization in a Full-Site Editing World Gutenberg 12.5 and Roadmap for WordPress 6.0 with co-hosts Grzegorz Ziolkowski @gziolo + Birgit Pauli-Haack @bph Special guest: Matias Ventura @matias_ventura [link]

Locking down design and blocks, Gutenberg 12.5, Learn.WordPress - Weekend Edition 202 - curated by Birgit Pauli-Haack @bph TY to contributors @fabiankaegy @ryanwelcher @pootlepress @courtneyr_dev @get_dave @ellen_bauer @joyofwp 1/2 [link] This is a massive edition, with even more brilliant contributors: @jcasabona @MehtaTrishan @thespacedmonkey @aurooba @kevinbatdorf @thewpminute @salcode @herb_miller @ronnieburt @kjellr 2/2 üéâüòç
How to disable theme features and Lock Block Templates for Full-Site Editing in WordPress TY to @ryanwelcher @carolinapoena and @davidgwyer for their tools and teachings! [link]
How Theme Blocks work with Full-Site Editing - A technical walk-through by Luis Felipe Zaguini #WordPress [link]
